Title: The EntreLeadership Podcast 2021: A Year In Review
Description:
Wow! Can you believe the year is almost over? Whether 2021 was your best year yet or one you’d rather forget, we hope you feel a sense of accomplishment. You didn’t give up. You didn’t back down. You kept growing, learning and listening. So, here’s to you! Thank you for letting The EntreLeadership Podcast be a part of your journey this year.

Let’s reflect on 2021 and prepare for what’s ahead with highlights from this year’s top episodes.

 

  1. Managing Your Time and Energy with Carey Nieuwhof

The Rundown: Tune in as pastor, author and podcast host Carey Nieuwhof shares his wisdom about time management. He challenges us to be passionate and fully present in everything we do, instead of pretending we don’t have enough time in the day to do it all.

 

  1. Avoid Failure by Following These Marketing Principles with Seth Godin

The Rundown: Want to know the number one way to increase profitability in your business? Marketing expert Seth Godin has the answer. Spoiler: It’s all about keeping your promises and building trust and loyalty with your customers.

 

  1. Take Control of Your Life and Business with Christy Wright

The Rundown: Does your life feel out of balance in this season? Business coach and bestselling author Christy Wright shares tips from her latest book, Take Back Your Time, that will help you prioritize the right things at the right time, so you don’t feel pressured to do all the things all the time. 

 

  1. How to Lead and Scale Your Sales Team with Brian Buffini

The Rundown: Ready to scale your business beyond just yourself? Real estate legend Brian Buffini has the tips you need to systematize your tasks and train up your team. He also shares his secrets to staying top of mind for customers so they’ll come back—and tell their friends!

 

The EntreLeadership Podcast

Listen to the full episodes:

  • Managing Your Time and Energy with Carey Nieuwhof
  • Avoid Failure by Following These Marketing Principles with Seth Godin
  • Take Control of Your Life and Business with Christy Wright
  • How to Lead and Scale Your Sales Team with Brian Buffini
